column5: Was wondering the white bass have started to run there and if so how long does the run last for? I'm planning to head out there to catch some sometime next week, the white bass have been on my bucket list for some time.
Its usually early June.  Once you start seeing 12 ft boats with 5 people in it from the city, you know the whities are running.
Its usually early June. Once you start seeing 12 ft boats with 5 people in it from the city, you know the whities are running.  Ok, that was funny!
Its usually early June. Once you start seeing 12 ft boats with 5 people in it from the city, you know the whities are running. Are those the ones that have pointy hats ? ? ?
Fish the Detroit River you can fill coolers full in hours, they are like sea gulls of the sea, cant keep them off your line
